title: Reply to Vadhan et al. – Correspondence on Curran et al. (2018) ‘Which biological and self-report measures of cannabis use predict cannabis dependency and acute psychotic-like response’
abstract: Reply to Vadhan et al. – Correspondence on Curran et al. (2018) ‘Which biological and self-report measures of cannabis use predict cannabis dependency and acute psychotic-like response’ - Volume 49 Issue 10
